properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 04 APR
   BY M/V AMAZON WARRIOR TOWING 12 9000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-56S 039-38W, 23-21S 040-24W,
   22-42S 039-48W, 23-11S 039-03W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 APR 19.
